titles: The onely remedy that can cure a people, when all other remedies faile. By F. Rous.
author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.
publisher: Printed [by H. Lownes] for Iames Boler at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls church-yard,
notes: Print faded on pages 86, 96 and 142, with some loss of print; pages 80-105 from Cambridge University Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
keywords: Providence and government of God --  Early works to 1800.
